item.title: Archive
item.description: See my now page for my latest updates. Archived on 2024-05-02 Self Hosting stuff I’m working on my tech independence and putting my tech skills to the test. This also relates to things I’ve been reading about permacomputing. By keeping the services I depend on to things that I can host and maintain and on older hardware that I’m in charge of, maybe I’m taking a step towards making technology more sustainable for the planet.
